title: Scarlet Sands Caravan
prompt: (masterpiece), best quality, highly detailed 2D anime style illustration, full-body vertical shot (9:16), an epic desert caravan crossing massive red sand dunes at sunset. Cloaked figures (desert nomads) ride camels and pull a covered wagon. The lead traveler holds a tall staff topped with a glowing blue magical orb. In the background, looming ancient, layered stone ruins (ziggurat structure). Dramatic, vibrant orange and red sky, huge setting sun near the horizon, stylized clouds, visible alien moon/planetoid in the upper purple sky, line art, manga aesthetic.
